metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010305 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
libmspack 0.9.1alpha is affected by: Buffer Overflow. The impact is:Information Disclosure. The component is: function chmd_read_headers() inlibmspack(file libmspack/mspack/chmd.c). The attack vector is: the victimmust open a specially crafted chm file. The fixed version is: after commit2f084136cfe0d05e5bf5703f3e83c6d955234b4d.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-1010305` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmspack0 - 0.10.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmspack package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.10.1-1').
